h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Stained Jade Gourd Location
content: As The Scorpionlord is optional, you will want to keep to the right from the area's first Shrine. Here you will find the Bounds of Deity's Abode Shrine. Up the stairs, The Scorpionlord can be found drinking on the top of a building. Rile him up by destroying some of the pots to initiate the fight.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Stained_Jade_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Stained Jade Gourd', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Stained Jade Gourd Location'.
The content is as follows:
As The Scorpionlord is optional, you will want to keep to the right from the area's first Shrine. Here you will find the Bounds of Deity's Abode Shrine. Up the stairs, The Scorpionlord can be found drinking on the top of a building. Rile him up by destroying some of the pots to initiate the fight.
